title: directory traversal
extract: Directory traversal or Path Traversal is an HTTP attack which allows attackers to access restricted directories and execute commands outside of the web server's root directory. Web servers provide two main levels of security mechanisms. Access Control Lists (ACLs) Root directory.
extract_html: Directory traversal or Path Traversal is an HTTP attack which allows attackers to access restricted directories and execute commands outside of the web server's root directory. Web servers provide two main levels of security mechanisms. Access Control Lists (ACLs) Root directory.
